LayoutPanel_shortcut.name: Shortcut
LayoutPanel_shortcut.tooltip: Keyboard shortcut to toggle the UI layout panel (e.g. Alt+X).

LayoutPanel_opacity.name: Background Opacity
LayoutPanel_opacity.tooltip: Adjust the background opacity of the UI layout panel (0-100%).

LayoutPanel_buttonOpacity.name: Button Opacity
LayoutPanel_buttonOpacity.tooltip: Adjust the button opacity inside the UI layout panel (0-100%).

LayoutPanel_theme.name: Panel Theme
LayoutPanel_theme.tooltip: Select a visual theme for the UI layout panel.

ConnectionAnimation_effectExtra.name: Extra Effects
ConnectionAnimation_effectExtra.tooltip: Enable extra visual effects (glow, trails, etc.). May reduce performance on low-end hardware.

ConnectionAnimation_useGradient.name: Gradient
ConnectionAnimation_useGradient.tooltip: Use gradient colors for connections. Turn off to use a solid base color.

ConnectionAnimation_renderStyle.name: Render Style
ConnectionAnimation_renderStyle.tooltip: Choose how the connection path is rendered.

ConnectionAnimation_displayMode.name: Display Mode
ConnectionAnimation_displayMode.tooltip: Control when animated connections are shown.

ConnectionAnimation_staticRenderMode.name: Static Render
ConnectionAnimation_staticRenderMode.tooltip: Choose how static connections are rendered in hover/selected modes.

ConnectionAnimation_speed.name: Speed
ConnectionAnimation_speed.tooltip: Adjust the animation speed (0.5-3). Higher is faster.

ConnectionAnimation_samplingLevel.name: Sampling
ConnectionAnimation_samplingLevel.tooltip: Control sampling density for all effects. Lower is faster, higher is smoother (1-3).
